CustomField.description: • Maintained 99% data integrity across 1000+ enterprise Salesforce records supporting global users • Contributed to Agentforce implementation reducing manual inquiry processing by 35% • Redesigned data validation workflows reducing processing time by 40% • Created SOQL/SOQL queries supporting $50M+ deal flow with executive dashboards • Built Excel automation tools improving operational efficiency by 35% • Led database beta testing reducing errors by 93% and improving efficiency by 57% • Delivered $250K annual savings through regulatory compliance analysis • Achieved Agent Blazer Champion status with 92 Trailhead badges and 2 Superbadges • Built production AI-integrated Salesforce application (Job Search Assistant with Claude AI)
CustomField.label: Key Achievements
